title: HOME - a collection of poetry and art (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
H. N. Abrams / 1999 / Pdf / English / ISBN10 0810934353 / 136 pag / 16.2 MB

There is no place like home to spur the imagination. For centuries, it has been a boundless source of inspiration for artists and writers. A collection of poetry and art dedicated to this beloved theme, Home brings together more than fifty poems with a rich assortment of paintings, drawings, and photographs that complement them.

Selected by Stan Tymorek, this rare compendium of words and images will stir the memories and emotions of city and country dwellers alike. Included are works by poets such as Robert Creeley, Elizabeth Bishop. Derek Walcott, Pablo Neruda, W. B. Yeats, and Emily Dickinson, as well as poems that have been translated from Chinese, 
Japanese, and Spanish. Works of art by Edward Hopper, Andrew Wyeth. Jennifer Bartlett, Rene Magritte, Maxfield Parrish, Paul Klee, Walker Evans, and others relate eloquently to the poets words
